00056                 public function referrers_list()
00057                 {
00058                         $db = new DBConn();
00059                         
00060                         if (isset($_REQUEST['g']) && !empty($_REQUEST['g']))
00061                         {
00062                                 $db->prepare("SELECT `referrer`, COUNT(`referrer`) AS `count` " .
00063                                                 "FROM `visits` " .
00064                                                 "WHERE (`referrer` NOT LIKE 'http://{1}%' " .
00065                                                         "AND `referrer` LIKE '%{2}%' " .
00066                                                         "AND `referrer` != '') " .
00067                                                 "GROUP BY `referrer` " .
00068                                                 "ORDER BY `count` DESC " .
00069                                                 "LIMIT {3}",
00070                                                 $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'],
00071                                                 isset($_REQUEST['f']) ? $_REQUEST['f'] : '',
00072                                                 isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00073                         }
00074                         else
00075                         {
00076                                 $db->prepare("SELECT DISTINCT `id`, `date`, `referrer` " .
00077                                                 "FROM `visits` " .
00078                                                 "WHERE (`referrer` NOT LIKE 'http://{1}%' " .
00079                                                         "AND `referrer` LIKE '%{2}%' " .
00080                                                         "AND `referrer` != '') " .
00081                                                 "ORDER BY `date` DESC " .
00082                                                 "LIMIT {3}",
00083                                                 $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'],
00084                                                 isset($_REQUEST['f']) ? $_REQUEST['f'] : '',
00085                                                 isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00086                         }
00087                         $result = $db->exec();
00088                         
00089                         $this->referrers = array();
00090                         if ($db->num_rows() > 0)
00091                         {
00092                                 while ($referrer = mysql_fetch_assoc($result))
00093                                 {
00094                                         $this->referrers[] = $referrer;
00095                                 }
00096                         }
00097                         $db->free_result($result);
00098                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00099                 }

00115                 public function visits_list()
00116                 {
00117                         $db = new DBConn();
00118                         
00119                         $db->prepare("SELECT * " .
00120                                         "FROM `visits` " .
00121                                         "WHERE (`ip_addr` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00122                                                 "OR `gate` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00123                                                 "OR `referrer` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00124                                                 "OR `user_agent` LIKE '%{1}%') " .
00125                                         "ORDER BY `date` DESC " .
00126                                         "LIMIT {2}, {3}",
00127                                         isset($_REQUEST['f']) ? $_REQUEST['f'] : '',
00128                                         isset($_REQUEST['s']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['s']) ? $_REQUEST['s'] : 0,
00129                                         isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00130                         $result = $db->exec();
00131                         
00132                         $this->visits = array();
00133                         if ($db->num_rows() > 0)
00134                         {
00135                                 while ($item = mysql_fetch_assoc($result))
00136                                 {
00137                                         $this->visits[] = new Visit($item);
00138                                 }
00139                         }
00140                         $db->free_result($result);
00141                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00142                 }

00160                 public function queries_list()
00161                 {
00162                         $db = new DBConn();
00163                         
00164                         if (isset($_REQUEST['g']) && $_REQUEST['g'] == 'true')
00165                         {
00166                                 $db->prepare("SELECT `referrer`, COUNT(`referrer`) AS `count` " .
00167                                                 "FROM `visits` " .
00168                                                 "WHERE (`referrer` LIKE 'http://www.google%q=%' " .
00169                                                         "OR `referrer` LIKE 'http://%yahoo.com%p=%' " .
00170                                                         "OR `referrer` LIKE 'http://search.live.com/results.aspx?q=%') " .
00171                                                 "AND `referrer` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00172                                                 "GROUP BY `referrer` " .
00173                                                 "ORDER BY `count` DESC " .
00174                                                 "LIMIT {2}, {3}",
00175                                                 isset($_REQUEST['q']) ? $_REQUEST['q'] : '',
00176                                                 isset($_REQUEST['s']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['s']) ? $_REQUEST['s'] : 0,
00177                                                 isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00178                         }
00179                         else
00180                         {
00181                                 $db->prepare("SELECT `id`, `date`, `referrer` " .
00182                                                 "FROM `visits` " .
00183                                                 "WHERE (`referrer` LIKE 'http://www.google%q=%' " .
00184                                                         "OR `referrer` LIKE 'http://%yahoo.com%p=%' " .
00185                                                         "OR `referrer` LIKE 'http://search.live.com/results.aspx?q=%') " .
00186                                                 "AND `referrer` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00187                                                 "ORDER BY `date` DESC " .
00188                                                 "LIMIT {2}, {3}",
00189                                                 isset($_REQUEST['q']) ? $_REQUEST['q'] : '',
00190                                                 isset($_REQUEST['s']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['s']) ? $_REQUEST['s'] : 0,
00191                                                 isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00192                         }
00193                         $result = $db->exec();
00194                         
00195                         $this->queries = array();
00196                         if ($db->num_rows() > 0)
00197                         {
00198                                 while ($search = mysql_fetch_assoc($result))
00199                                 {
00200                                         preg_match("/(\&|\?)(p|q)=([^\&]+)/", $search['referrer'], $matches);
00201                                         $term = utf8_decode(urldecode($matches[3]));
00202                                         if (!empty($_REQUEST["q"]) && stristr($term, $_REQUEST["q"]) === FALSE)
00203                                         {
00204                                                 continue;
00205                                         }
00206                                         $this->queries[] = new Query(array_merge(array('term' => $term), $search));
00207                                 }
00208                         }
00209                         $db->free_result($result);
00210                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00211                 }

00227                 public function outbounds_list()
00228                 {
00229                         $dbconn = new DBConn();
00230                         
00231                         if (isset($_REQUEST['g']))
00232                         {
00233                                 $dbconn->prepare("SELECT `url`, COUNT(`url`) AS `count` " .
00234                                                 "FROM `outbounds` " .
00235                                                 "WHERE `url` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00236                                                 "GROUP BY `url` " .
00237                                                 "ORDER BY `count` DESC " .
00238                                                 "LIMIT {2}, {3}",
00239                                                 isset($_REQUEST['f']) ? $_REQUEST['f'] : '',
00240                                                 isset($_REQUEST['s']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['s']) ? $_REQUEST['s'] : 0,
00241                                                 isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00242                         }
00243                         else
00244                         {
00245                                 $dbconn->prepare("SELECT `id`, `occurred_at`, `url` " .
00246                                                 "FROM `outbounds` " .
00247                                                 "WHERE `url` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00248                                                 "ORDER BY `occurred_at` DESC " .
00249                                                 "LIMIT {2}, {3}",
00250                                                 isset($_REQUEST['f']) ? $_REQUEST['f'] : '',
00251                                                 isset($_REQUEST['s']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['s']) ? $_REQUEST['s'] : 0,
00252                                                 isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00253                         }
00254                         $dbconn->exec();
00255                         
00256                         $this->outbounds = array();
00257                         if ($dbconn->num_rows() > 0)
00258                         {
00259                                 while ($item = $dbconn->fetch_assoc())
00260                                 {
00261                                         $out = new Outbound($item);
00262                                         if (isset($item['count']))
00263                                         {
00264                                                 $out->count = $item['count'];
00265                                         }
00266                                         $this->outbounds[] = $out;
00267                                 }
00268                         }
00269                         $dbconn->free_result();
00270                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00271                 }

00281                 
00288                 public function hits_by_host_list()
00289                 {
00290                         global $db;
00291 
00292                         $db->prepare("SELECT `ip_addr`, `params`, COUNT(*) AS `weight` " .
00293                                         "FROM `visits` " .
00294                                         "WHERE `gate` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00295                                         "AND `date` >= '{2}' " .
00296                                         "AND (`ip_addr` LIKE '%{3}%' " .
00297                                         "OR `params` LIKE '%Apache'' => ''%{3}%') " .
00298                                         "AND `referrer` LIKE '%{4}%' " .
00299                                         "AND `user_agent` LIKE '%{5}%' " .
00300                                         "GROUP BY CONCAT(`ip_addr`, `user_agent`) " .
00301                                         "HAVING `weight` >= '{6}' AND `weight` <= '{7}' " .
00302                                         "ORDER BY `weight` DESC " .
00303                                         "LIMIT {8}",
00304                                         @$_REQUEST['p'],
00305                                         date("Y-m-d H:i:s", Time::ago(@$_REQUEST['t'])),
00306                                         @$_REQUEST['f'],
00307                                         @$_REQUEST['r'],
00308                                         @$_REQUEST['u'],
00309                                         @$_REQUEST['l'],
00310                                         @$_REQUEST['h'],
00311                                         9999);
00312                         $result = $db->exec();
00313                         
00314                         $this->hosts = array();
00315                         if ($db->num_rows() > 0)
00316                         {
00317                                 while ($line = mysql_fetch_assoc($result))
00318                                 {
00319                                         $host = Host::by_ip_addr($line['ip_addr'], $line['params']);
00320                                         $host->weight = $line['weight'];
00321                                         $this->hosts[] = $host;
00322                                 }
00323                         }
00324                         //$db->free_result();
00325                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00326                 }

00332                 public function ip()
00333                 {
00334                         $visit_factory = new Visit();
00335                         $this->visits = $visit_factory->find_by_query('SELECT * ' .
00336                                 'FROM `visits` ' .
00337                                 "WHERE `ip_addr` = '{$_REQUEST['ip']}' " .
00338                                 'ORDER BY `date` DESC');
00339                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00340                 }
00341                 
00346                 public function unblock_ip()
00347                 {
00348                         if (isset($_GET['id']))
00349                         {
00350                                 $blocked_ip = new BlockedIp();
00351                                 $blocked_ip->find_by_id($_GET['id']);
00352                                 $blocked_ip->delete();
00353                                 die(l('IP address unblocked.'));
00354                         }
00355                         die(l('You must provide an id in order to unblock an IP address.'));
00356                 }
00357                 
00362                 public function block_ip()
00363                 {
00364                         $blocked_ip = new BlockedIp();
00365                         $blocked_ip->ip_addr = $_REQUEST['ip'];
00366                         $blocked_ip->save();
00367                         die(sprintf(l('IP address %s correctly blocked.'), $_REQUEST['ip']));
00368                 }

00384                 public function blocked_ips_list()
00385                 {
00386                         global $db;
00387                         
00388                         $bip_factory = new BlockedIp();
00389                         $this->blocked_ips = $bip_factory->find_all(array(
00390                                 'where_clause' => "`ip_addr` LIKE '%{$db->escape(@$_REQUEST['q'])}%'",
00391                                 'order_by' => '`blocked_at` DESC'));
00392                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00393                 }

00425                 public function attribute_visits()
00426                 {
00427                         global $db;
00428 
00429                         $visit_factory = new Visit();
00430                         $visits = $visit_factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`date` >= '{$db->escape(date("Y-m-d H:i:s", Time::ago(@$_REQUEST['t'])))}' " .
00431                                         "AND (`ip_addr` = '{$db->escape(@$_REQUEST['ip'])}' " .
00432                                         "OR `params` LIKE '%Apache'' => ''{$db->escape(@$_REQUEST['ip'])}%')"));
00433                         if (count($visits) > 0)
00434                         {
00435                                 foreach ($visits as $visit)
00436                                 {
00437                                         $visit->person_id = @$_REQUEST['person_id'];
00438                                         $visit->save();
00439                                 }
00440                         }
00441                         $this->render(NULL);
00442                 }
